title: Update Compare Progress default slot 2 to 30 days back

requirements.summary: Change Progress Comparison modal default slot dates to 60 days back, 30 days back, and today (local start-of-day), while keeping user overrides via the calendar.
acceptanceCriteria: Opening "Compare Progress" shows Slot 1 initialized to 60 days back, Slot 2 initialized to 30 days back, and Slot 3 initialized to Today.

The comparison query is executed with target dates corresponding to 60 days back, 30 days back, and today (local start-of-day), matching the UI selections unless the user overrides a slot via the calendar.

file_operations.description: Update the default initialization for Slot 2 from 90 days back to 30 days back, and adjust any nearby in-file comments/labels describing the defaults to match (Slot 1 = 60 days back, Slot 2 = 30 days back, Slot 3 = today). Ensure the initial target dates remain normalized to local start-of-day via existing time utilities.
